channel.title: Chaor on Chaotic Online
channel.description: Recent content in Chaor on Chaotic Online

item.title: A Rare Hazard
item.description: In the first episode of the Second Season, we will have a closure for events of the previous episode, with right to terrorism and espionage

item.title: Battle Lessons
item.description: In this episode Tom gets to know more about the main event in Chaotic: The CodeMasters Matches!

item.title: Battledrome of the Sexes
item.description: In this episode, we’ll discover (or not) who plays Chaotic better, men or women, boys or girls, in a fight between Peyton and Krystella.

item.title: Big Time
item.description: In this episode we’ll see Sarah’s quest to get the scan of a rare and powerful winged Danian that ends up on her frustrating a kidnapping attempt by an enemy Tribe

item.title: Chaor's Commandos (Part 1)
item.description: In this episode we’ll see an elite squad led by Chaor in a bold raid on Kiru City towards the Overworld Arsenal

item.title: Chaor's Commandos (Part 2)
item.description: In the continuation of the previous episode we’ll see Chaor’s invasion to the Overworld Arsenal in Kiru City

item.title: Chaotic Crisis
item.description: In this episode, the Creatures of Chaotic invade Earth! Let’s get Chaotic… for our planet!

item.title: Chaotikings
item.description: In this episode we’ll see Kaz’s initiation in the most famous “club” in Chaotic… or not.

item.title: Colosseum Showdown
item.description: In this episode we’ll see a little misunderstanding end up in an epic way in the best Real Steel style

item.title: Crash Course
item.description: In this episode, Kaz faces Klay in a dispute while Tom tries to get the scan of a lunatic Creature whose life is playing tricks.

item.title: Dual Duel (Part 1)
item.description: In this episode we’ll see Krystella and Klay up to no good (again), resulting in an interesting dual battle for the scan of a wicked Battlegear.

item.title: Dual Duel (Part 2)
item.description: In the continuation of the previous episode, we’ll not only see the ending of the battle in midst of Krystella and Klay’s mental games but we’ll see as well that… well… karma is a bitch ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

item.title: Earth to Kaz
item.description: In this episode we’ll see Kaz’s passion for Chaotic becoming a problem for him when he needs to prove to the psychologist of his school that Chaotic is a real place O_O

item.title: Fallen Hero
item.description: In this episode we’ll see a treacherous coup of Lord Van Bloot against Maxxor that could destroy the OverWorld.

item.title: Fighting Friendly (Season Finale)
item.description: In this episode… the end! Of the season, of a promising career and of a long time friendship…

item.title: Fire Fighters
item.description: In this episode we’ll see a hot fight, literally, in which both players will try to prove their own superiority as well as of one of of the Four Elements.

item.title: From the Deep (Part 1)
item.description: In this episode, a mysterious Creature from a long forgotten past arises again with astonishing and disturbing revelations about the future of Perim

item.title: From the Deep (Part 2)
item.description: In the continuation of the previous episode, betrayal, brainwash, a military coup and the beginning of the end… Let the Invasion begin!

item.title: Going Under
item.description: In this episode we’ll see a small part of one of the most known teachings of Sun Tzu’s The Art of War in Chaotic: Know your enemy!

item.title: Kickin' Bot
item.description: In this episode, Perim’s Dr. Frankenstein decides to implement part of his own brain in the Gigantroopers, making them intelligent enough to try to take over the Underworld, resulting in a battle in the best Pacific Rim style

item.title: Lord of Treachery
item.description: In this episode, we’ll meet the treacherous Lord Van Bloot, second in command of the Underworld, and how Chaor makes of Kaz his spy and uses the Chaotic battles as a military strategy against him

item.title: Maxxor
item.description: Maxxor is an OverWorld Hero and ruler of the OverWorld Tribe

item.title: Maze of Menace
item.description: In this episode, continuing the sequence in which the Commander of the Otherworld, Maxxor, was ambushed by Lord Van Bloot’s treacherous Mugic, we’ll see a partnership between Creatures and humans to restore the Fallen Hero before it’s too late.

item.title: Over-Under Rent Asunder
item.description: The ancient war between Good vs. Evil in the Chaotic universe: OverWorld vs. UnderWorld.

item.title: Perithon!
item.description: In this episode, after an intense battle and glorious victory over the M’arrillians, the Tribes decide to keep Tribal Alliance towards a prosperous Perim and, to celebrate the peace, they make a car race… but old habits die hard…

item.title: Son of the Spiritlands
item.description: In this episode, an indestructible Creature from the Spiritlands threatens to destroy the whole Perim unless Tangath Toborn faces him.

item.title: Takinom
item.description: Takinom is an UnderWorld Commander who serves Chaor as one of his Counselors, along with Agitos.

item.title: The Birth of Borth-Majar
item.description: In this episode we will know the origins of an unusual creature, Borth-Majar, and how Kaz deals with his collective individually personality (what? O.o)

item.title: The Floundering Father
item.description: In this episode we’ll see a blabbermouth knows-it-all father getting real after a quadruple challenge

item.title: The Floundering Father
item.description: In this episode we’ll see a blabbermouth knows-it-all father getting real after a quadruple challenge

item.title: Threshold of Destruction
item.description: In this episode, once Dranakis Threshold’s secret leaked out, several players ported to ancient Perim, including Chaotic’s “Bonnie & Clyde”, who didn’t take long in conspiring with an old acquaintance, making of a painful event become, potentially, irreversible.

item.title: UnderWorld Overthrown
item.description: In this episode we’ll see Chaor and his loyal fighters execute a battle plan against the M’arrillians in the Marsh of Murk

item.title: UnderWorld Overthrown
item.description: In this episode we’ll see Chaor and his loyal fighters execute a battle plan against the M’arrillians in the Marsh of Murk

item.title: Unexpected
item.description: In this episode we’ll meet the fourth member of the group, Peyton, and his… “eccentric”, personality.
